pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cross-platform port of the GPLed Arx Fatalis sources to Linux, OpenGL, OpenAL and SDL. This package only includes the game executable - you will also need the data files from the original game.

use.flag: Build tools that can extract the game's data and save files.
Build everything in one big source file, allowing for faster build times and better optimizations at the cost of higher memory usage.
Build at Qt-based tool that allows to submit crash information to the upstream backtracker.
